meaningMnemonic: Under a <radical>canopy</radical> your <radical>clan</radical> digs in the <radical>ground</radical>, trying to get to the <kanji>bottom</kanji>. They want to build a nice home your entire clan can live in, but they need to get to the bottom before they'll start building.
readingMnemonic: Suddenly someone down in the hole shouts that they've reached the <kanji>bottom</kanji>, but it's full of water and they're all <reading>soak</reading>ed (そこ)!
